courseDescription:
This course, Microsoft Office Access 2013 Advanced, will provide you with an understanding of the advanced tools and skills used in Microsoft Access. You will learn how to implement advanced form design such as adding controls to form, creating sub-forms, and, enhancing navigation of forms. You will be able to explain how to use data validation like form validation as well as field and record validation. You will also learn about using macros to improve user interface design, this includes creating a macro and automating data entry using a macro.

This course then explains how to use advanced database management like determining object dependency and analyzing the performance of a data base. You will learn about distributing and securing a database. You will also learn about splitting a database for multiple user access and implementing security.

This course then wraps up with Managing Switchboards. You will learn how to modify a database switchboard and set startup option. By taking this course you will learn the advanced tools and skills used in Microsoft Access 2013. So why wait? Start learning today.
